vsParam:
Searching... My biography...
Found it. This is it, right?

Let me see who's so blind that
he couldn't see... how great I...

Uh, what's the matter, Verbena!?
Why did you stop talking...

Lies... All lies...
Why would you...

Ah. Hmm... Sorry.
I'm just shocked.

The author of this biography...
is someone I know.

Yes. More than that... We were childhood sweethearts,
and he was the First Mate of Voltex.

He was known as the "Sea-dividing Eros",
but he wasn't included in the legend.

I see. So your childhood sweetheart wrote a biography of you...
But, don't you feel weird about this?

If he was your childhood sweetheart and also your
First Mate, he must have spent lots of time with you, right?

But... How come he took your achievements lightly in his book,
Verbena?

This is probably because...
he hated me.

Many people on that ship hated me...
Actually, I lost my life because my men betrayed me.
I'm sure Eros hated me as well...

"This Tales of Adventure just captures a fraction of her
achievements, not to mention other aspects of her adventures".

"Because... even if she has lost her life...
she'll definitely embark on new adventures".

He wrote that at the end of the biography.
I don't think Eros hated you at all, Verbena.

He knew that you'd never stop embarking on new adventures
even if you already died. So he purposely...

He purposely understated the achievements made when you were
alive so that your adventures after your death can be highlighted.

I see. It's his way of rooting for you, Verbena,
and expecting you to make more brilliant achievements.

Otherwise, he would not record your achievements properly.
... Is that right?

How... How stupid. "That man". He,
he didn't say anything about himself, just me...

What... What a... (Sobbing)
What a... stupid man...!
